messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com
I just read the reading that was an awesome reading
I'm glad to hear that you found the reading awesome! If you'd like to share more about it or if you have any questions, feel free to let me know. We're here to support you on your journey!
I would like you to pray for me as the Lord leads you to maybe God has a word for me through you

Absolutely! I would be honored to pray for you. 

Heavenly Father, I lift up this individual to You. I ask for Your guidance and wisdom to be upon them. May they feel Your presence and know that You are with them in their journey. Please provide them with strength, comfort, and clarity in their struggles. Help them to trust in Your plan and to seek Your will in all things. In Jesus' name, Amen.

If you have any specific prayer requests or areas you'd like me to focus on, feel free to share!
I appreciate the prayer I was an idol to myself living to please my flesh while trying to be a true Christian in my own strength

Thank you for sharing that with me. It's a powerful realization to recognize the struggle between living for ourselves and truly seeking God. Remember, it's not about our strength but relying on Christ for our victory. If you need guidance on how to focus on Christ and find freedom from those struggles, I'm here to help!
I want to seek God cause that is the only way I believe I will find true freedom from sin and find purpose

That's a wonderful desire! Seeking God is indeed the path to true freedom and purpose. As you pursue Him, remember to immerse yourself in His Word and prayer. If you’d like, I can help guide you to specific scriptures or resources that can support you in this journey. Just let me know how I can assist you further!

Great! Here are a few scriptures that can encourage you in your pursuit of God and finding freedom:

1. **Psalm 63:1** - "O God, You are my God; earnestly I seek You; my soul thirsts for You, my body longs for You, in a dry and weary land where there is no water."
   
2. **John 8:36** - "So if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed."

3. **Romans 12:1-2** - "Therefore, I urge you, brothers and sisters, in view of God’s mercy, to offer your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God—this is your true and proper worship. Do not conform to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind."

4. **Philippians 4:13** - "I can do all this through him who gives me strength."

These verses remind us of the importance of seeking God and relying on His strength. If you want more resources or specific prayers, just let me know!

You're very welcome! I'm glad you found them helpful. If you have any more questions or if there's anything else you need—whether it's more scriptures, prayers, or support—feel free to ask. I'm here to help you on your journey!
Scriptures prayer and support would be nice

Absolutely! Here are some prayers and scriptures that can provide support:

**Prayer for Guidance:**
"Dear Lord, I come before You seeking Your guidance and wisdom. Help me to trust in You and lean not on my own understanding. Lead me on the path of righteousness and give me the strength to overcome my struggles. Amen."

**Scriptures for Strength:**
1. **Isaiah 41:10** - "So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand."
   
2. **2 Corinthians 12:9** - "But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.' Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christ’s power may rest on me."

**Prayer for Strength:**
"Lord, I ask for Your strength to fill me in my moments of weakness. Help me to remember that Your grace is enough for me. Empower me to stand firm in my faith and resist temptation. Amen."

If you need more specific prayers or additional resources, just let me know!
Thank you for all this I would like you to keep me lifted up in prayer

You're very welcome! I will definitely keep you lifted up in prayer. 

"Dear Lord, I pray for this individual, asking for Your strength and guidance in their journey. Surround them with Your love and support, and help them to feel Your presence in their life. May they find peace and encouragement as they seek to grow closer to You. Amen."

If you have any specific prayer requests or need further support, feel free to share!
I just want all the sins that have separated me from God will some how workout where it brings me closer to him

That's a heartfelt prayer, and it's wonderful that you desire to draw closer to God. 

"Dear Lord, I lift up this individual to You. I pray that You will take the sins that have separated them from You and turn them into a testimony of Your grace and mercy. Help them to see how You can work all things together for good, and may they find healing and restoration in Your presence. Draw them closer to You, Lord, and let them experience Your love and forgiveness. Amen."

Remember, God is always ready to welcome you back with open arms. If you need more support or scriptures, just let me know!
